sentences.english: Fathers would see paternity pay increased to two weeks’ on full pay.

sentences.english: I am six weeks into my maternity leave with my second child.

sentences.english: On maternity leave, taking care of Gustave , seven months old, and Ceasar, two years old.

sentences.english: Use when you give three months maternity leave to payees.

sentences.english: Now I look at colleagues routinely taking a year's maternity leave and returning part-time.

sentences.english: A new EU directive on maternity leave will come into force next month.
